amendment.description: To provide for a demonstration project for the exclusion of brachytherapy devises from the prospective payment system for outpatient hospital services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1045 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1045 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S8681-8683; text: CR S8682-8683) To provide for a demonstration project for the exclusion of brachytherapy devises from the prospective payment system for outpatient hospital services.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1045 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Chambliss.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1045 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
